channel.title: [PI] Help running a client
channel.description: I downloaded Pegasus' client from rserver and it doesn't have a run.bat file and i dont use eclipse.. and im new to coding so considering i havent touched a rsps for like a year. Anybody know how i could make a run.bat file and compiler that work? i tried taking them from my other old clients but i get errors and the client doesnt load. Will be grateful if anybody has any ideas

item.title: [PI] Help running a client
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[quote=“AddictivePkz, post:1, topic:531800”]I downloaded Pegasus’ client from rserver
and it doesn’t have a run.bat file and i dont use eclipse… and im new to coding so considering i havent touched a rsps for like a year. Anybody know how i could make a run.bat file and compiler that work? i tried taking them from my other old clients but i get errors and the client doesnt load. Will be grateful if anybody has any ideas[/quote]

Are you sure it isn’t just renamed?
Also if you see a .project/.classpath it means you will need an IDE to open it bu creating a Run.bat isn’t that hard, just try around and if you really can’t fix the error then post it here. (I also think there are plenty of tuts for it)

GL

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help running a client
item.dc:creator: @serversdownload serversdownload
item.description:
@serversdownload wrote:

when you download it. 1.
you change the ips from 127.0.0.1 to yours.
2. put your java on each of the compitlers…
3, you run it and enjoy…
